title: Margaret Curran – 2012 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Margaret Curran, the Shadow Secretary of State for Scotland, to the Labour Party conference on 2nd October 2012.
content:

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
